title: Tuzigoot National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Be a Junior Ranger! The Junior Ranger program at Tuzigoot National Monument is a great way for our young visitors to have fun, earn their badge and be more aware of their surroundings.  The program is easily completed on a visit to Tuzigoot and helps kids understand the relationship of the environment to the prehistoric people who inhabited the Verde Valley. Click here for more details!       Be A Web Ranger!           Want to be a Web Ranger?? Check out all the games you can play, while learning about different parks, what rangers do, and all the fun to be had across our country! Click the link below! http://www.nps.gov/webrangers/
